workflow.name: Create Site Hierarchy in Catalyst Center from NetBox
workflow.title: Create Site Hierarchy in Catalyst Center from NetBox

properties.name: Status
properties.description: NetBox status to filter sites and locations (e.g., planned, active)

properties.name: Sites Array
properties.description: JSON array of sites from NetBox

properties.name: Catalyst Center Parent
properties.description: Parent hierarchy name in Catalyst Center (fixed: Global)

properties.name: Current Location ID
properties.description: NetBox location ID for current location being processed

properties.name: Locations Array
properties.description: JSON array of locations from NetBox

properties.name: Tenant Name
properties.description: NetBox tenant name to filter sites and locations

properties.name: Current Site ID
properties.description: NetBox site ID for current site being processed

Creates site hierarchy in Catalyst Center based on NetBox data.

Prerequisites:
• Tenant area (e.g., Global/BRKOPS-2357) must already exist
• Region areas (e.g., Global/BRKOPS-2357/AMER) must already exist
• Import AtomicGetDataFromNetBox.json and AtomicPatchNetBox.json atomic workflows first

Workflow:
1. Calls AtomicGetDataFromNetBox atomic workflow 3 times:
   - Get tenant by name
   - Get sites by tenant_id and status
   - Get locations by tenant_id and status
2. Creates Buildings in Catalyst Center (from NetBox sites)
3. Creates Floors in Catalyst Center (from NetBox locations)
4. Uses AtomicPatchNetBox to update NetBox status to active after successful creation

Hierarchy: Global/{TenantName}/{Region}/{Building}/{Floor}
properties.display_name: Create Site Hierarchy in Catalyst Center from NetBox

properties.description: Creates building in Catalyst Center from NetBox site
Updates the NetBox site status to active after successful Catalyst Center building creation
